content.text: You're at a self-checkout in an Albert Heijn supermarket. The machine is beeping, and an employee comes to help. They'll ask you a question you don't understand.

data.Ik spreek niet zo goed Nederlands: I don't speak Dutch very well

data.tip: The Dutch 'g' is a soft, throaty sound, like the 'ch' in 'loch'. It's not a hard 'g' like in the English word 'go'.

content.title: Expressing Confusion
content.setting: An Albert Heijn employee has approached your beeping self-checkout machine.

conversation_flow.title: State that you don't understand
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goedemiddag. Even kijken... Heeft u een bonuskaart?

conversation_flow.title: Explain that you don't speak Dutch very well
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oh, sorry. Ik zal het langzamer zeggen.

content.text: The employee now understands you're learning Dutch. They will try to simplify the question about the store's loyalty card, the 'Bonuskaart'.

data.Ik heb geen bonuskaart: I don't have a bonus card

content.text: To say you don't have a noun (like a bonus card), use 'geen'. For example, 'Ik heb geen auto' (I don't have a car).

content.title: Answering the Question
content.setting: The employee is clarifying their question about the loyalty card.

conversation_flow.title: Answer 'no' and say you don't have a bonus card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, geen probleem. De bonuskaart... de klantenkaart van Albert Heijn. Heeft u die?

content.text: Perfect! The employee has fixed the machine. Now you just need to pay and thank them for their help.
In the Netherlands, 'pinnen' is the verb for paying with a debit card and PIN. It's the most common way to pay.
Use 'Dank u wel' when speaking formally to people you don't know, like employees. Use 'Dank je wel' for friends and family.

content.title: Finalizing the Transaction
content.setting: The employee has cleared the error on the machine so you can pay.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you can pay by card
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, geen bonuskaart. Dan druk ik hier. Zo, u kunt nu betalen.

conversation_flow.title: Thank the employee for their help
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Jazeker. U kunt uw pas invoeren.
